about_the_game:
Embark on an extraordinary journey as RoboKid, a robot housing the soul of a child, determined to cleanse a spaceship infested with otherworldly creatures. Dive into a metroidvania experience that combines combat, atmosphere, and deep exploration, promising a fresh take on the genre.

FIGTHING SYSTEM

Arm RoboKid with a versatile arsenal, including guns and attachable weapons, to battle a diverse array of monsters, ranging from regular aliens to formidable bosses.

Strategically collect upgrades by either finding them or defeating specific creatures, enhancing RoboKid's combat capabilities.

MULTIPLAYER

Embark on the main story with a friend by joining in cooperative multiplayer mode.

Achieve a seamless gaming experience as progress made in both single-player and multiplayer modes is shared and carries over between them.

Transition between single-player and multiplayer modes without interrupting your gaming experience.

Engage in battles against your friend in a dedicated versus mode.

ATMOSPHERE

Immerse yourself in a captivating and atmospheric world with visual tweaks that bring the game to life.

Dynamic particle effects make the environment feel alive, creating an immersive and engaging experience.

LEVEL DESIGN

Navigate through intricately designed levels, where each room offers new challenges, puzzles, and surprises, ensuring a diverse and engaging gameplay experience.

Take advantage of the 2.5D dimension to explore rooms with platforming segments, adding an extra layer of depth and excitement to the gameplay.

Low-end computer compatibility

Enjoy the game on a wide range of computers with adjustable graphics settings and sound volume controls, ensuring accessibility for all players.

PLAYER MODIFICATION

Level up Robokid by collecting XP orbs from defeated enemies, enhancing your combat power.

Discover modifications scattered throughout the spaceship, granting Robokid new skills such as double jump or wall jump.

Confront powerful bosses to earn unique abilities that will prove crucial in your quest to uncover the truth.

Game Description:

Robot with a soul of the kid is trying to clear spaceship infested with otherworldly creatures, during his adventure robokid will find modifications for his body, it may just laying down on the floor, some creatures will give them to the robot, or you have to KILL some creatures to get upgrades. You will find out not all the strange-looking creatures are hostile and you may talk to them to know better what is happening on the ship. Solve simple puzzles, explore unique rooms, defeat enemies, upgrade yourself and unravel the truth behind the invasion.

ROBOKID is a game created by the gamer for the gamers who wants to find a new way of playing metroidvania. Promises a metroidvania experience tailored for gamers seeking a new and refreshing blend of exploration, secrets, and unique enemies within a captivating sci-fi setting.

name: Robokid

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 - 4360
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 - 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1050 TI
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: You are the robot with mindset of a kid, but your robotic body allowing you to fight better than most humans. Your goal is to solve the mystery how aliens got into spaceship and, most importantly to discover "who YOU are for real?" A strange scientist will accompany you during the exploration
